text: The tangram is a puzzle consisting of seven flat shapes, called tans, which are put together to form shapes. The objective of the puzzle is to form a specific shape using all seven pieces. People believe it was invented in China during the Song Dynasty, and then brought to Europe in the early 19th century. == Number of configurations == Over 6500 different tangram problems have been created from 19th century texts. == Pieces == There are seven peices called Tans: * 5 triangles , two built with the main diagonal of the same size, the two small ones of the central strip are also of the same size. * 1 square * 1 parallelogram or rhomboid ==References== Category:Puzzles
title: Tangram
